Package model

Class ModelManager

java.lang.Object
model.ModelManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
CashierModel, DashboardModel, InventoryModel, Model, SettingsModel, StoreModel, UserModel
public class ModelManager extends Object implements Model
The client model manager

    • getDayProgress

      public double getDayProgress()
      Description copied from interface: DashboardModel
      Formula x = now() - openingHour() // hours passed t = closingHour() - openingHour() 1 ------- t y ------- x y = x / t y = ( now() - getOpeningHour() ) / ( closingHour() - openingHour() )
      Specified by:
      getDayProgress in interface DashboardModel
      Returns:
      the current working day progress (from opening hour to closing hour is from 0 to 100) as a number on a scale from 0 to 1, where 0 is the first working hour and 1 is the last OR 0 if the store is outside working hours

    • getMonthProgress

      public double getMonthProgress()
      Description copied from interface: DashboardModel
      Formula x = LocalDateTime.now().getDayOfMonth() t = LocalDateTime.now().getCurrentMonthTotalDays() 1 ------- t y ------- x y = LocalDateTime.now().getDayOfMonth() / LocalDateTime.now().getCurrentMonthTotalDays()
      Specified by:
      getMonthProgress in interface DashboardModel
      Returns:
      the current month progress (from first to last day is from 0 to 100) as a number on a scale from 0 to 1, where 0 is the first day of the month and 1 is the last day

      Specified by:
      getLockedState in interface SettingsModel
      Returns:
      the locked state of the store, true is locked, false is unlocked
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a fetch-from-database error

    • scanItem

      public ArrayList<Item> scanItem(String barCode) throws RuntimeException
      A method to be called when the cashier scans an item
      Specified by:
      scanItem in interface CashierModel
      Parameters:
      barCode - needs to provide a valid item id as a String
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the current Items in the checkout
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the barcode is not found as WRONG_BARCODE or if there are no more items for the current barcode as NO_MORE_ITEMS_IN_STOCK

    • checkout

      public Double checkout() throws RuntimeException
      A method to be called after the cashier finishes scanning all the items and wants to get the total
      Specified by:
      checkout in interface CashierModel
      Returns:
      the total amount for the current checkout
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there are no items in the current checkout

      completePayment in interface CashierModel
      Parameters:
      paymentType - needs to provide a valid PaymentType argument
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - currently not thrown

    • cancelCheckout

      public void cancelCheckout() throws RuntimeException
      A method to be called if the cashier wants to cancel the checkout being currently in progress (e.g. the customer can not pay / the customer doesn't want to buy the items for some reason)
      Specified by:
      cancelCheckout in interface CashierModel
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - currently not thrown

    • undoCheckout

      public void undoCheckout(Integer checkoutId) throws RuntimeException
      A method to be used if the cashier wants to undo an already completed checkout (e.g. customer wants the money back, the checkout was done for testing purposes)
      Specified by:
      undoCheckout in interface CashierModel
      Parameters:
      checkoutId - the id of the checkout needed to be undone
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the checkoutId is not found
